page.title: 11Burton Latimer - Industry
page.content: There are 9 different types of industry.These are shown below. Plastics 2 Food 2 Footwear 4 Horticulture 1 Car sales/service 10 Carpenters 2 Engineering 7 Building Contractors 3 Distribution 2 The largest industry in the town is "Weetabix Ltd."There are over 1 000 people working there.It is the only one in the world.The breakfast cereal it makes is sent all over the world. At one time there was a water mill on the River Ise that ground flour.Weetabix is made from whole wheat into cuboids about 10cm long,4cm wide & 1.5cm deep. In the 1960's "Weetabix" was the 2nd best selling cereal in the U.K.They have been awarded Queen Elizabeth II's & the Queen Mother's "by appointment" seal.
